price: (Woi) ne Nokorε no a efiri wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ, enti hwε na w’ankͻka wͻn a wͻn adwen nnsi wͻn pie no ho.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
